document.discussion_title: Catch the New England Patriots tonight on The CW Springfield! | WWLP.com
document.topic_text:
Catch the New England Patriots tonight on The CW Springfield! Game will be on The CW Springfield due to NBC coverage of Olympic Games on 22News August 11, 2016, 11:27 am Updated: Click to share on Pinterest (Opens in new window) FOXBOROUGH, Mass. (WWLP) – If you have been suffering all spring and summer without football, your wait is over Thursday night! The New England Patriots will take the field for their first preseason game against the New Orleans Saints. Coverage begins at 7:30 P.M. Thursday night’s game, and the following preseason game on August 18, will be on The CW Springfield due to NBC’s coverage of the Olympic Games. The CW Springfield is available on the following channels: Comcast : Channels 16 and 820 Charter : Channels 13 and 788 DirecTV : Channel 23 Can’t see The CW Springfield? Important info for DirecTV, over-the-air viewers
22News reporter Ashley Afonso will be at Gillette Stadium for a preview of tonight’s game on 22News starting at 5:00. New England Patriots Preseason Schedule: Thursday, Aug. 11 – 7:30PM (vs New Orleans) The CW Springfield Thursday, Aug. 18 – 8:00PM (vs Chicago) The CW Springfield Friday, Aug. 26 – 7:30PM (@Carolina) WWLP-22News Thursday, Sept. 1 – 7:00PM (@New York Giants) WWLP-22News Share this:
